SEARCH
Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseReporter

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface DatabaseReporter
An observer used to monitor the timing of queries. All query operations all SELECTs, UPDATEs, INSERTs and DELETEs will execute reporter.table("TABLE").operation("SELECT").timing("SELECT * FROM ...", millis) upon completion. Create implementations of this interface to keep timing information.

For example, with DropWizard Metrics you may want to do something like this:

 MetricRegistry registry = new MetricRegistry();
 DatabaseReporter reporter = tableName -> operation -> (query, timing) -> {
      registry.timer(tableName + "/" + operation).update(Duration.ofMillis(timing));
      registry.timer(tableName + "/" + operation + "/" + query).update(Duration.ofMillis(timing));
 }
 DbContext context = new DbContext(new DatabaseStatementFactory(reporter));

    Description
    static final DatabaseReporter
    LOGGING_REPORTER
    Returns a reporter which logs the queries to SLF4J
